collection_metadata.name: FeatBit featbit-react-native-sdk Evaluation Tests
collection_metadata.description: Evaluation test collection for featbit-react-native-sdk skill

test_items.name: react-native-sdk-mobile-setup
test_items.description: Validates React Native setup with FeatBit SDK for mobile applications
test_items.input_task_prompt: How do I integrate FeatBit in my React Native mobile app? Show me installation, provider setup, and usage in components.
test_items.evaluation_prompt:
Expected Result:
- NPM install command
- iOS/Android setup if needed
- FbProvider setup
- useFlags() or useFbClient() hooks
- Mobile-specific user context
- Offline handling mentioned

Evaluation Method:
1. Check installation steps
2. Verify native setup if required
3. Confirm provider configuration
4. Check hook usage
5. Verify mobile considerations

Pass Criteria:
- Complete installation steps
- Provider properly configured
- Hooks correctly used
- Mobile-specific guidance
- Working example provided

Fail Criteria:
- Missing installation steps
- No mobile considerations
- Web-only patterns
- Missing offline handling
